dstm2.factory

Interface Adapter<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Adapter, Adapter, Adapter, Adapter, Adapter

    public interface Adapter<T>
    User-defined factories use this adapter interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Adapter.Getter<V>
      A Getter object represents V getMumble() method.
      static interface  Adapter.Setter<V>
      A Setter object represents void setMumble(V value) method.
